insert into ZYC.BUSI_QUALITYPIC
QCID, WLID, ISFILE, "PATH", PICINDEX,

update ZYC.BUSI_QUALITYPIC

where QCID = #{qcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.select:
select
